content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(45.0, -80.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (45.0, -80.0) with copper ore as input and copper plate as output
- Burner mining drill at position (43.0, -84.0) for mining copper ore

### Iron plate mine at position(40.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (40.0, -82.0) with iron ore as input and iron plate as output
- Furnace at position (45.0, -83.0) with iron ore as input and iron plate as output

### Coal storage at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (43.5, -82.5) for storing coal

### Coal storage at position(43.5, -81.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (43.5, -81.5) for storing coal and iron plates

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace contains the item to be extracted before attempting extraction
- Make sure to check the furnace's status and warnings before extracting items

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available before crafting an item
- Make sure to check the crafting machine's status and warnings before crafting an item

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has fuel and ingredients before starting the smelting process
- Make sure to check the furnace's status and warnings before starting the smelting process

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the target tile is empty before placing an entity
- Make sure to check the entity's placement requirements before placing it

### Errors when mining resources
- Ensure that the mining drill has fuel before starting the mining process
- Make sure to check the mining drill's status and warnings before starting the mining process
